## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                                               | Type      |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` |                                                                                                                                                                                           | `boolean` |
| `factor`   | `factor`   | Default value: 1. The factor that the properties `value`, `valuemax` and `valuemin` are multiplied by. On `change` divides the value by the factor, so the original format stays the same | `number`  |
| `label`    | `label`    |                                                                                                                                                                                           | `string`  |
| `unit`     | `unit`     |                                                                                                                                                                                           | `string`  |
| `value`    | `value`    |                                                                                                                                                                                           | `number`  |
| `valuemax` | `valuemax` |                                                                                                                                                                                           | `number`  |
| `valuemin` | `valuemin` |                                                                                                                                                                                           | `number`  |
